availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, shoemaker. Native of Ireland. Son of Hugh McLaughlin. Married to Bridget Jordan McLaughlin in Louisville, Kentucky, on October 8, 1862. Father of Hugh McLaughlin and Annie McLaughlin. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 315.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Minnesota, Murray County, Bondin, p. 15D.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000819615.
"William McLaughlin," Pennsylvania, U. S., Death Certificates, 1906-1968, Pennsylvania Historic and Museum Commission, Harrisburg, PA, Erie County, File 46581.
